### Welcome to my webpage!

<img src="images/muhire_picture.png" style="width:75%">

I am a first year Ph.D. student in the Biostatistics department in the Mailman School of Public Health at Columbia University in New York, NY. I was born and raised in Kigali, Rwanda and I obtained my undergraduate degree in Mathematics at Spelman College in Atlanta, GA.
